key_findings.limited_scope_reality: Very few attorneys explicitly advertise unbundled legal services for probate matters. Most results are for family law limited scope representation.
key_findings.geographic_challenges: Many Heggstad specialists found are outside LA County (Oakland, Bay Area, Chico, Palm Springs). LA-specific options are limited.
key_findings.firm_size_issue: Many Heggstad petition specialists are firms (not solo practitioners), which per V2.0 strategy makes them high-risk for limited scope availability.
key_findings.email_scarcity: Only 1 of 11 new candidates has a publicly available email address. Most require contact forms or phone calls.
key_findings.top_priority_candidates: David A. Shapiro (LA-based specialist) and Ravi Patel (solo practitioner with proven track record) are the highest-priority new candidates.

immediate_high_priority: Contact David A. Shapiro via phone (310) 853-1554 or website form
Contact Ravi Patel via phone 510-443-0443 or website form
Request email addresses and fee quotes from both
if_top_2_decline: Phone call to Alan Gallivan (if willing to travel to LA)
Verify Citadel Law and Amity Law Group firm policies on limited scope
do_not_pursue: Geographic distant candidates (Lauren Peebles, Nikki Farris)
Insufficient info candidates (Tresp Law, Moravec Varga)

comparison_to_original_10_candidates.original_highest_score: Schomer Law Group - 66 current / 94 potential (Section 850 specialist)
comparison_to_original_10_candidates.new_highest_score: David A. Shapiro - 69 current / 94 potential (LA-based, Board Certified)
comparison_to_original_10_candidates.new_second_highest: Ravi Patel - 67 current / 93 potential (Solo, Heggstad specialist)
comparison_to_original_10_candidates.analysis: New candidates David Shapiro and Ravi Patel score comparably to or higher than original candidates. Both are strong additions to candidate pool.

expanded_search_effectiveness.assessment: PARTIAL SUCCESS - Found 2 high-quality new candidates (David Shapiro, Ravi Patel) but most results were either geographically distant, firms (not solo practitioners), or non-attorneys. Limited scope probate representation is a rare service.

pfv_v14_compliance: VERIFIED - All new candidates rated with V2.0 mandatory verification gates
